g.text: Subject_DN in ICP-Brasil Transporte BRCAC certificates
Request the issuance of the certificate
A Java Script in the document can be used to help the subject_DN extraction
Insert extract value into string tls_client_auth_subject_dn
Compare extracted value with string value
The value of the UID field of the certificate must match the one sent in the SSA,
where the UID field must contain the value of the software_id field of the SSA
organizationIdentifier will be found in the Subject DN in ASN.1 format,
and must be decoded using the "string encoding"
comparison should be made as described in item 14
The value of the organizationIdentifier field of the certificate must contain the prefix
corresponding to the Registration Reference OFBBR- followed by the value of the SSA org_id field.
For certificates issued until August 31, 2022: the value of the
OU field of the certificate must contain the value of the org_id field of the SSA.
